casebody.data:
YOUNG (Lindquist)
v.
YOUNG. No. 213A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 05, 2005. Ronnie M. Mitchell, Harold Lee Boughman, Jr., Fayetteville, for Steven Paul Young. Nancy L. Grace, for Alvin & Sharon Young.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Nona Young (Lindquist)) shall have up to and including the 28th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of July 2005."
